titleStmt.title: By the Lieutenant-General Ginckell, commander in chief of their Majesties forces. The stealing of horses being too frequent and pernicious to their Majesties service. ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.
Reede-Ginckel, Godard, Baron van, 1644-1703.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queens most Excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties castle of Dublin, this 12th day of May, 1691.".
Steele notation: Arms 193. being upon accor-.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
